statements: SELECT * FROM merchandise_sales;
SELECT sale_id, item_name FROM merchandise_sales WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM merchandise_sales WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, item_type, quantity FROM merchandise_sales WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM merchandise_sales GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT * FROM merchandise_sales WHERE item_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, item_name, price FROM merchandise_sales WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY sale_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, SUM(price*quantity) AS total_revenue, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM merchandise_sales WHERE item_type = 'Clothing';
SELECT item_name, item_type, price*quantity AS total_price FROM merchandise_sales WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_type, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM merchandise_sales GROUP BY item_type HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE merchandise_id = 1;
SELECT merchandise_name, price FROM merchandise WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY merchandise_id ASC;
SELECT merchandise_name, sale_quantity FROM merchandise JOIN sales ON merchandise.merchandise_id = sales.merchandise_id WHERE sale_quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY merchandise_id DESC, merchandise_name ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_quantity, merchandise_name FROM sales JOIN merchandise ON sales.merchandise_id = merchandise.merchandise_id WHERE sale_quantity >= 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT merchandise_name, price FROM merchandise WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC, merchandise_name ASC

SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_quantity, price FROM sales JOIN merchandise ON sales.merchandise_id = merchandise.merchandise_id WHERE sale_quantity > 5 AND price < 100 ORDER BY sale_quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT merchandise_id, merchandise_name, sale_quantity FROM merchandise LEFT JOIN sales ON merchandise.merchandise_id = sales.merchandise_id WHERE sale_id IS NULL ORDER BY merchandise_id ASC
SELECT * FROM t_shirts;
SELECT color, size, price FROM t_shirts WHERE price > 20;
SELECT t_shirt_id, color FROM t_shirts WHERE size = 'XL';
SELECT * FROM souvenirs ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM souvenirs WHERE category = 'Mugs' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT name, category FROM souvenirs WHERE price < 20;
SELECT color, size, price FROM t_shirts WHERE color = 'Blue' OR color = 'Red' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT m.sale_id, m.item_id, s.name, m.quantity, m.total_price FROM merchandise_sales m JOIN souvenirs s ON m.item_id = s.souvenir_id;

SELECT m.sale_id, s.name AS souvenir_name, t.size AS tshirt_size, m.quantity, m.total_price FROM merchandise_sales m JOIN souvenirs s ON m.item_id = s.souvenir_id JOIN t_shirts t ON m.item_id = t.t_shirt_id WHERE m.quantity > 1 ORDER BY m.total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchandise;
SELECT merchandise_name, price FROM merchandise ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT merchandise_name, merchandise_type, price FROM merchandise WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM theater_staff WHERE department = 'Concessions';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, performance_date FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM merchandise_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT merchandise_id, merchandise_name, price FROM merchandise WHERE merchandise_type='Electronics';
SELECT staff_name, position, department FROM theater_staff WHERE department='Production' ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT merchandise_id, merchandise_name, price FROM merchandise WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts;
SELECT shirt_id, color, price FROM t_shirts WHERE size = 'M';
SELECT * FROM souvenirs ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, description FROM souvenirs WHERE price < 50;
SELECT sale_id, total_price, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM t_shirts WHERE color = 'Red' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM souvenirs WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_price < 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT t.shirt_id, t.size, s.item_name, s.price FROM t_shirts t JOIN souvenirs s ON t.price = s.price ORDER BY t.shirt_id ASC, s.item_name DESC;
